T02D2307:247b-0: @247b * // glu mkhan la gdams pa bzhugs /
T02D2307:247b-2: # // kye ho sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba'i gsung //
T02D2307:247b-3: mdzad pa rnam grol ye shes chen po la //
T02D2307:247b-4: dgyes mnyam rol pas chos kyi phung po rnams //
T02D2307:247b-5: yid 'ong glu ru thub pas bka' stsal ta //
T02D2307:247b-6: gsang sngags brda yi tshig mthun bka' lung can //
T02D2307:247b-7: zab mo'i sgra sgrogs rnam dag sngags nyid de //
T02D2307:247b-8: lus can gdung ba sel ba bde ba'i sgra //
T02D2307:247b-9: grag stong gnyis su med pa zung 'jug dang //
T02D2307:247b-10: snang ba sku la sgra tshig sna tshogs gsung //
T02D2307:247b-11: mkhyen pa thugs la bya ba yon tan yin //
T02D2307:247b-12: mdzad pa phrin las ye shes rnam pa lnga //
T02D2307:247b-13: phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2307:247b-14: glu yi mkhan po mnyam gnas ngo bo'i sku //
T02D2307:247b-15: thams cad sprul pas 'phro bar khyab par gsungs //
T02D2307:247b-16: de nyid dbyer med ngang du 'dus pa thugs //
T02D2307:247b-17: rgyal ba'i gsung la tha dad med pa yi //
T02D2307:247b-18: aa yis drangs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra //
T02D2307:247b-19: ngo bo skye med brjod pa'i yul las 'das //
T02D2307:247b-20: nga ro bcu drug rang byung dga' ba yin //
T02D2307:247b-21: shes rab yum chen kho nas 'dren pa'o //
T02D2307:247b-22: gsal byed 'dren pas mi 'byung tshig tu 'brel //
T02D2307:247b-23: thub pa'i dgongs pa lkog gyur mkhyen pa gnyis //
T02D2307:247b-24: thugs rjes spro phyir gsal ba'i tshig tu brgyus //
T02D2307:247b-25: don chen ston pa glu yi tshig yin no //
T02D2307:247b-26: pho yis drangs nas mo yi rgyun dang ldan //
T02D2307:247b-27: gnyis med nga ro gsal ba mtho dang dma' //
T02D2307:247b-28: sems byung rgyun gcod dang du gnas par byed //
T02D2307:247b-29: de'u yi sgra ste 'dren pa glu yi rgyan //
T02D2307:248a-0: sgra yis yid mtshon tshig gi don la @248a * //
T02D2307:248a-2: / dgyes pa'i rang rtsal mi mthun phyogs las rgyal //
T02D2307:248a-3: gsang sngags bden pa'i ngag tu byin gyis rlob //
T02D2307:248a-4: mi dmigs thugs rje mnyam pa'i dbyings las byung //
T02D2307:248a-5: ye shes chen po sgyu mar rang snang bas //
T02D2307:248a-6: zag med snyan pa'i nga ro bsod nams tshogs //
T02D2307:248a-7: gsang ba'i dbyings las rab tu 'phros gyur pa //
T02D2307:248a-8: dkyil 'khor mtha' yas rnams la rol pas dbul //
T02D2307:248a-9: dbang po yul dus rags ba'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D2307:248a-10: 'byung ba shes rab byang chub rdo rje ste //
T02D2307:248a-11: lhag pa'i ye shes de bzhin nyid mchog la //
T02D2307:248a-12: skal pa mnyam pa'i mnyes pa chen po'o //
T02D2307:248a-13: de ltar glu yis 'jig rten gdung sel cing //
T02D2307:248a-14: 'jig rten 'das pa mnyes pa'i mchod pa ste //
T02D2307:248a-15: don du nges pa ngag gi rig byed can //
T02D2307:248a-16: mkhyen pa'i 'jug sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
T02D2307:248a-17: sdug bsngal bde bar sbyar bas mthu stobs can //
T02D2307:248a-18: nyon mongs rnam grol ye shes chen po'i lam //
T02D2307:248a-19: las las ye shes 'byung bas 'dzin pa med //
T02D2307:248a-20: nges par sbyor bas rdo rje'i tshig gi glu //
T02D2307:248a-21: rang bzhin gnyis med dgongs pa mtha' yas ston //
T02D2307:248a-22: de yi rgyu nyid don dam blo las 'das //
T02D2307:248a-23: 'bras bu rol pa'i dkyil las rngam pa'i gdangs //
T02D2307:248a-24: mi dmigs thugs rje'i rtsal du rang shar ro //
T02D2307:248a-25: chos rnams ma lus sems su 'dus pa ste //
T02D2307:248a-26: sems las ma gtogs shes bya gzhan med pas //
T02D2307:248a-27: sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas rgyal ba'i thugs //
T02D2307:248a-29: rang byung dga' bas 'gro ba'i gdung ba sal//
T02D2307:248a-30: dangs ma rtser phyin mkhyen pa bsam mi khyab //
T02D2307:248a-31: skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'i rtse mo'i bar //
T02D2307:248a-32: skyong ba'i glu mkhan tilli pa yin no //
T02D2307:248a-34: yon tan sgyu ma yin pas skyon la dngos ma grub //
T02D2307:248a-35: gnas la nges pa med pas 'pho 'gyur nyam ming //
T02D2307:248a-36: sems la skye shi med de 'od gsal dang //
T02D2307:248a-37: dran rig sna tshogs ye shes rol pa'i rtsal //
T02D2307:248a-38: de ltar shes pas spang blang 'dzin pa med //
T02D2307:248a-39: rig pa'i ngo bo mnyam las ma g-yos par //
T02D2307:248a-40: dur khrod chen por smyon pa'i spyod pa gyis //
T02D2307:248a-41: rnal 'byor rnams la nga yis lung bstan no //
T02D2307:248b-0: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug @248b tilli pas /
T02D2307:248b-1: 'dus pa rin po che'i tshong dus su glu mkhan
T02D2307:248b-2: la gdams pa rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa
